detectors.description:
Reentrancy in Crowdsale.buyTokens(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AllowanceCrowdsale.sol#357-374):
	External calls:
	- _processPurchase(beneficiary,tokens) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AllowanceCrowdsale.sol#367)
		- _token.safeTransfer(beneficiary,tokenAmount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AllowanceCrowdsale.sol#408)
		- (success,returndata) = address(token).call(data) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AllowanceCrowdsale.sol#154)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- TokensPurchased(msg.sender,beneficiary,weiAmount,tokens) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AllowanceCrowdsale.sol#368)
detectors.markdown:
Reentrancy in [Crowdsale.buyTokens(address)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AllowanceCrowdsale.sol#L357-L374):
	External calls:
	- [_processPurchase(beneficiary,tokens)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AllowanceCrowdsale.sol#L367)
		- [_token.safeTransfer(beneficiary,tokenAmount)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AllowanceCrowdsale.sol#L408)
		- [(success,returndata) = address(token).call(data)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AllowanceCrowdsale.sol#L154)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- [TokensPurchased(msg.sender,beneficiary,weiAmount,tokens)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AllowanceCrowdsale.sol#L368)
